meanings.sent1: Her unfeigned smile showed her true happiness.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your unfeigned support during this difficult time.
meanings.sent3: His unfeigned surprise at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unfeigned joy in her eyes was like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The unfeigned kindness of the stranger left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.sent1: His unfeigned apology was heartfelt and genuine.
meanings.sent2: She spoke with unfeigned confidence in her abilities.
meanings.sent3: The unfeigned shock on his face was priceless.
meanings.sent4: The unfeigned simplicity of the design was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: Their unfeigned laughter filled the room with warmth.
